description: Component that displays an empty state.

image.description: The image to be displayed for empty state. Required. Will throw an error if unset.

primaryBtnTemplate.description: Use the primaryBtnTemplate to add any extra elements to the secondary button, such as icons or dropdowns. When using this template, do not use primaryActionText instead, include it within the template itself.

secondaryBtnTemplate.description: Use the secondaryBtnTemplate to add any extra elements to the secondary button, such as icons or dropdowns. When using this template, do not use secondaryActionText instead, include it within the template itself.

subtitle.description: The sub-title of the empty state. Defaults to an empty string.

title.description: The title of the empty state. Required. Will throw an error if unset.
